From the brand

CRZ YOGA is a global popular athletic apparel brand. We’re constantly updating our clothing fabric and style to meet our people’s needs and to be consistent with our goal bringing people a healthy and beautiful life.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.86 x 8.39 x 1.65 inches; 4.2 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 15, 2020
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08QMV5V3X

Imported
Designed for low to medium impact. Perfect for Pilates, Yoga, lounge, gym workout, training, athletic, running or daily wear.
Naked Feeling Collection: Workout sports bras for women, made of stretchy, buttery soft and sweat-wicking fabric.
Wireless yoga bras with removable pads, providing you more flexibility & all-day comfort.
Longline design provides more coverage and stability, boosting your workout performance.
Stylish Strappy back helps you move with ease and makes you look sexy. Bonded straps sit flat without digging in.

The Naked Feeling collection focuses on providing silky soft feeling and chafe-free comfort. Four-way stretch gives perfect amount of compression. Get this strappy longline sports bra for your daily workout. You can also freely hit the street with this fashionable bra.

Naked Feeling Longline Strappy Sports Bras

NAKED FEELING FABRIC

No restriction on the move

  • Buttery soft, so comfortable and lightweight
  • Slick, cool to touch
  • 4-Way stretch, gentle compression support
  • 71% Polyamide, 29% Spandex

NEW COLLECTION：BUTTERLUXE COLLECTION

  1. Move with ease and comfort anywhere anytime.

    Designer objective: Butterluxe collection engineered for extremely soft comfort. Super stretchy material made for all ways you move.

    FIND OUT MORE BUTTERLUXE COLLECTION BELOW OR AT OUR STORE


  2. Brushed for extremely softness, max comfort

    Softness

    It’s so comfortable and lightly brushed, you won’t want to take it off. Pure soft touch, allowing for the highest levels of comfort and mobility.

  3. So lightweight yet squat proof, gentle compression

    Lightweight

    Light enough weight with a very gentle compression, the nearly weightless fabric keeps you relaxed and peaceful.

  4. Fully stretchy for flexibility and shape-retention

    Stretchy

    Added "Lycra Black" fabric has high recovery power, Long last fit and shape-retention. Put them on and flow with your body.
